            好价失效
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_one" data-type="1" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_one"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_one" class="">无货或下架</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_two" data-type="2" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_two"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_two" class="">已涨价</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_three" data-type="17" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_three"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_three" class="">优惠券或促销活动失效</label>
                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error1" data-name="内容问题">
            内容问题
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：

                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->

                                    </div>

                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->

                                                    <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 end -->
                                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                            <!-- 展示出的二级评论的回复框 -->
                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                                <!-- 二级回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">
                                                    <input type="hidden" name="type" value="3">
                                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="143120824">
                                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="341936514">
                                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给优惠券小小值"></textarea>
                                                </form>
                                                <!-- 二级评论回复的表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">

                                                    </div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply-line"></div>
                                        </div>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                            <!-- .comment-main-list-item-content-reply-more 二级评论有分页时展示 -->
                                                                    <div class="J_open_more comment-main-list-item-content-reply-more" data-root-id="341929219" data-next-comment-id="341936514">
                                        <span>还有1条回复</span>
                                        <i class="icon-chevron-down-o"></i>
                                    </div>

                                <div class="J_close_more comment-main-list-item-content-reply-close">
                                    <span>收起所有回复</span>
                                    <i class="icon-chevron-up-o"></i>
                                </div>
                                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </li>
                
                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论说明 start -->

            </ul>
                        <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠的评论 end -->
            <!-- 分页样式 -->
            <ul class="pagination"><li><a href="#comments" class="pageCurrent pagination-item">1</a></li><li><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item">2</a></li><li class="pagedown"><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item"><i class="icon-angle-right-o-thin"></i></a></li><li class="jumpToPage">转至<input type="text" class="input_num" id="input_num">页</li><li><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="a_jumpTo" onclick="return on_check_comment_page(2, '', this)">GO</a></li></ul>        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- 评论列表 end -->
